Package com.clientwallet.model

Class Wallet

java.lang.Object
com.clientwallet.model.Wallet
@Entity public class Wallet extends Object
Wallet represents a user's wallet that stores funds and keeps track of transactions. It contains the wallet's name, currency type, balance, and timestamps for creation and updates.

This class is mapped to the "wallet" table in the database and supports entity lifecycle hooks to automatically set the creation and update timestamps.

  • Constructor Details

      public Wallet()

  • Method Details

    • prePersist

      public void prePersist()
      Pre-persist lifecycle hook to automatically set the creation and update timestamps when the wallet is created.

      This method is automatically invoked before the wallet is persisted to the database, ensuring that the createdAt and updatedAt fields are populated.

    • preUpdate

      public void preUpdate()
      Pre-update lifecycle hook to automatically update the updatedAt timestamp whenever the wallet is updated.

      This method is automatically invoked before an update to the wallet is persisted to the database.
